backend/main.mo: Backend canister defining user profiles, roles, terms, stores, products, orders, reviews, and authorization helpers using Map/List-based state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, descriptions, related frontend files, components, and test mappings for recent app changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing their functionality, routing, UI behavior, and terms-handling logic.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Gitignore rules for Android build artifacts, IDE files, keystores, and generated assets.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Android app Gradle config defining SDK versions, dependencies, build types, and a task to copy web assets into the APK.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Android manifest defining app permissions, main activity, launcher intent, and deep link handling for auth return.
frontend/android/app/src/main/assets/www: Placeholder file ensuring the assets directory is preserved in version control.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/p: Main Android activity hosting the WebView, handling auth deep links, injecting flags, and routing external identity URLs via Custom Tabs.
Utility for detecting identity provider URLs, handling return deep links, and opening external auth flows in Custom Tabs.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/drawab: Splash screen layer list showing a white background and centered launcher icon.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/layout: Layout containing a full-screen WebView used to load the web application.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Round adaptive launcher icon configuration referencing the same foreground asset.
Adaptive launcher icon configuration with white background and foreground asset.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: App string resources defining the application name.
App theme configuring splash screen background and no-action-bar layout.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Project-level Gradle config defining plugins, repositories, and a clean task.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Gradle properties including JVM args, AndroidX usage, and Kotlin style settings.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Gradle wrapper configuration specifying distribution source for Gradle 8.2.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Gradle settings defining repositories and including the Android app module.
frontend/docs/android-apk-build.md: Guide describing prerequisites and steps for building the PrimePost Android APK.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/build-android-apk-debug: PowerShell script that builds the web app and generates a debug Android APK on Windows.
Shell script that builds the web app and generates a debug Android APK on Unix systems.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router and root component managing routes, authentication state, and setup dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/TermsManag: Admin panel for viewing, editing, and publishing customer, owner, and privacy policy documents.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen informing users they lack permission and offering navigation back home.
frontend/src/components/auth/BiometricEn: Dialog allowing users to enable biometric authentication with success and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/PinSetupDia: Dialog guiding users through creating and confirming a 4‑digit PIN.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for filling out user profile details, selecting a role, and optionally accepting terms.
frontend/src/components/auth/UnlockDialo: Biometric and PIN-based unlock dialog that manages authentication flow and errors.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Application layout with role-based navigation, header, footer, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeProvi: Theme context provider managing light, dark, and system modes with persistence.
frontend/src/components/theme/ThemeToggl: Button component that toggles between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor, refreshing it when identity changes.
Detects Android WebView and wraps Internet Identity login with Android-specific error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useBiometricAuth.ts: Manages enabling and verifying WebAuthn biometric authentication with local storage state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity context and provider handling login, logout, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalPin.ts: Manages PIN storage and unlock state using localStorage, sessionStorage, and a reactive store with functions to set, verify, lock, and unlock the session.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for backend operations like fetching and updating profiles, terms content, and admin actions, wired through an actor interface.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables for colors, layout, and component styling.
frontend/src/legal/providedLegalText.ts: Contains static customer and store owner legal documents as multi-line text strings for display in the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
Admin dashboard showing store, customer, and order metrics with analytics views and controls to block or unblock stores.
frontend/src/pages/auth/RoleLoginPage.ts: Role-based login screen using Internet Identity and Android auth bridging, redirecting users to dashboards based on their role and profile.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart, allowing quantity updates, item removal, and navigation to stores or checkout.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CheckoutPage: Handles checkout flow including table info, payment selection, biometric or PIN auth, and order submission.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerDash: Displays dashboard actions for navigating to store access, search, marketplace, cart, and orders.
frontend/src/pages/customer/MarketplaceP: Shows marketplace products with search, category filtering, sorting, and add‑to‑cart functionality.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrderDetailP: Displays detailed info for a specific order including items, status, table number, and notes.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Lists active and completed orders with status badges and navigation to order details.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreAccessP: Provides a form to enter a store ID and navigate to that store’s product page.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreDetailP: Displays store details, reviews, and product list, allowing users to add items to the cart and navigate to the cart page.
frontend/src/pages/customer/StoreSearchP: Provides search and filtering UI for finding stores by name or category and navigating to store detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/owner/InventoryPage.t: Allows store owners to view, create, edit, and delete products with image uploads and stock management.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OrdersManagemen: Enables store owners to view orders by status and update each order’s progress through acceptance and completion actions.
Lists the owner's stores with navigation to inventory, orders, and settings, and offers store registration.
frontend/src/pages/owner/StoreRegistrati: Form page for creating a new store with fields for name, category, location, and mobile money number.
frontend/src/pages/owner/StoreSettingsPa: Store settings form allowing owners to view and update store details using query hooks and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/public/ApkDownloadPag: Public page offering an APK download link with installation steps and a return-to-home button.
frontend/src/pages/terms/PrivacyPolicyPa: Loads and displays the privacy policy content with fallback messaging and a home navigation button.
frontend/src/pages/terms/TermsAcceptance: Displays customer or owner terms, requires acceptance, and records acceptance before redirecting.
frontend/src/state/cartStore.ts: Zustand store managing per‑store shopping carts with add, remove, update, clear, and total‑calculation logic.
frontend/src/state/pinSessionStore.ts: In‑tab reactive store tracking whether a PIN is set and whether the session is unlocked.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Utility functions aggregating orders into daily, weekly, and monthly revenue and count statistics.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Money helpers for formatting prices and computing discounted or line‑total amounts.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL and hash parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing stored or hash-based params.
frontend/src/utils/userProfile.ts: Provides display name and initials extraction from a UserProfile object with fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/webauthn.ts: WebAuthn utilities for checking availability and creating or retrieving platform credentials with proper error handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata capturing requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for PrimePost.
